imgHero.alt: Innovative solutions for your food and beverage business - Where everything comes together

tp_pw_hero.hero_tagline: Innovative solutions for your food and beverage business

tp_pw_articleBlock.container_title: We see the whole picture of your production
tp_pw_articleBlock.article_text: You may know us from our packages or processing equipment. This, combined with our ability to deliver  solutions throughout your entire production makes us unique. Our end-to-end solutions seamlessly integrate processing, packaging, automation and technical services. The result is not just added convenience for you - it is also increased efficiency, quality and reliability. When we integrate and manage the whole value chain, we're able to help you optimise operations to the fullest.

img.alt: Complete solutions - Ensure efficiency and quality

tp_pw_article_col.article_text: Do you want big particles, high viscosity or a perfectly smooth mouthfeel? Batch or continuous? Either way you get best practice in terms of food safety, efficiency, product quality and environmental performance. We give you new ways to move forward with your business. Together we turn challenges into success.

Protect your food and beverages in the very best way. We offer you the most attractive and complete carton packaging range for consuming fresh and safe products. All our packages provide consumer convenience, easy opening, optimal shelf life – and the ability to stand out and give your brand maximum exposure.

Our services offer is not just about fixing something that's broken. It's about preventing breakdown and protecting investments. We cover every aspect of your food production. Our tailored service solutions improve performance, optimise costs and ensure food safety throughout the lifecycle of your operation.
tp_pw_article_col.btnText: How our services improve your business

tp_pw_articleBlockVideo.article_text: Food, beverages or cosmetics? No matter what product, we provide you with the processing and packaging solutions that suit your needs. We collaborate with you to develop recipes and design production processes with smart environmental thinking. We help you turning ideas into products that your customers love.
tp_pw_articleBlockVideo.btnText: Discover what we can do for your products

imgText.alt: Ambient yoghurt from the world's most digital dairy

tp_pw_imageText.container_title: Ambient yoghurt from the world's most digital dairy
tp_pw_imageText.article_text: Bright Dairy is China’s third largest dairy producer and the leading high-end producer of dairy products in China. With our help, they successfully developed and launched the world’s first ever ambient yoghurt product for the Chinese market in 2010.
tp_pw_imageText.btnText: Learn how we met the challenges

tp_pw_tabMenuListItem.tabMenuLinkText: Partnership boosts sales for Dairy Plus drinking yoghurt
Securing FDA compliance thanks to Tetra Pak Automation Services
​​​​​​​​Improved quality management helps milk producer reduce loss of sales
Rice pudding in ready-to-drink package for the first time
Kaslink teams up with Tetra Pak to stay one step ahead​

content.title: Collaboration for the optimal solution
content.text: How do you fight a declining market and rising prices? Dairy Plus teamed up with us to create the solution that is optimal for their consumers and the brand. The sales of Dairy Plus drinking yoghurt – launched in Tetra Brik® Aseptic 100 Base – have doubled since 2010, reaching 680 million packs in 2016.
